mapper.select: select A.msg_idx, A.title, A.m_idx, A.receive_m_idx, B.nickName, A.sdate, A.readSw, A.msg_category from message2 A, member2 B where (A.receive_m_idx=B.m_idx and A.m_idx=#{m_idx}) or (A.m_idx=B.m_idx and A.receive_m_idx=#{m_idx}) order by A.msg_idx desc limit #{vo.sin} , #{vo.pageSize};
select A.*, B.nickName, C.name as category_name from message2 A,member2 B, message2_category C where A.receive_m_idx = B.m_idx and A.msg_category = c.msg_category and A.msg_idx=#{msg_idx}
select A.*, B.nickName, C.name as category_name from message2 A,member2 B, message2_category C where A.m_idx = B.m_idx and A.msg_category = c.msg_category and A.msg_idx=#{msg_idx}
select ${searchOption},m_idx from member2 where ${searchOption} like concat('%',#{searchStr},'%');
select msg_category, name as category_name from message2_category;

select A.msg_idx, A.title, A.sdate, A.readSw, B.nickName, C.name as category_name from message2 A, member2 B, message2_category C where A.receive_m_idx = B.m_idx and A.m_idx = ${m_idx} and A.msg_category = C.msg_category order by msg_idx desc limit ${vo.sin}, ${vo.pageSize};

select A.msg_idx, A.title, A.sdate, A.readSw, B.nickName, C.name as category_name from message2 A, member2 B, message2_category C where A.m_idx = B.m_idx and A.receive_m_idx = ${m_idx} and A.msg_category = C.msg_category order by msg_idx desc limit ${vo.sin}, ${vo.pageSize};

select A.msg_idx, A.title, A.content, A.m_idx, B.nickName, C.name as category_name from message2 A, member2 B, message2_category C where A.m_idx = B.m_idx and A.msg_idx=#{msg_idx} and A.msg_category = C.msg_category;

select A.rep_idx, A.title, A.takeSw, A.wdate, B.name as category_name from report2 A, report2_category B where A.rep_category = B.rep_category and A.m_idx = #{m_idx} order by rep_idx desc limit #{vo.sin}, #{vo.pageSize}
select rep_category,name as category_name,idxName from report2_category where tableName=#{tableName} order by rep_category desc;
select A.*, B.tableName, B.idxName, B.name as category_name from report2 A ,report2_category B where A.rep_category = B.rep_category and A.rep_idx = #{rep_idx};
select title from board2 where boa_idx = #{vo.reported_idx};

select content from board2_reply where rep_idx = #{vo.reported_idx};
select extra from friendbanList where m_idx = #{m_idx} and t_idx = #{t_idx} andstatus<3 ;

select A.ask_idx, A.title, A.takeSw, A.wdate, B.name as category_name from ask2 A, ask2_category B where A.m_idx = #{m_idx} and A.ask_category = B.ask_category order by ask_idx desc limit #{vo.sin},#{vo.pageSize}
select ask_category, name as category_name from ask2_category;

select A.title, A.ask_category, A.content, A.wdate, A.tdate, A.takeSw, A.takeContent, B.name as category_name from ask2 A, ask2_category B where A.ask_idx = #{ask_idx} and A.ask_category = B.ask_category
select extra from friendBanList where m_idx= #{m_idx} and t_idx =#{t_idx} and status = '3';
